column4: hello! i'm a new user of Ubuntu. Why Rhytmbox play music only 1-2 sec and stop? How to solve this problem?
applejack, on site Ubuntu.com i see only beta 10.10 and i downloaded it

be cautious if using PS2 mouse and/or keyboard.  Myself, along with some others I found on the web, had trouble with the keyboard/mouse becoming unoperative using 10.04.  Was quite annoying.  I went with 9.10
